NoticedPoisoning.synopsis: A nearby goblin saw the player poison the vat of beer and confronts them.

individual_metadata.synopsis: A goblin comes up to you after you've poisoned the beer and gives you a glass of newly poisoned alcohol, proposing a toast. She's standing on a cage (about 2m high) together with the player.
individual_metadata.how_to_trigger: - In DebugBook: GoToRegion -> Act1 -> GOB - GoblinCamp -> Teleport to Festivities Area (anything)- In DebugBook: Set quest flags & option -> Act1 -> GOB - Goblin Camp -> Goblin Toast -> Poison the beer tub- Get near the goblin stage

PoisoningInterrogation.synopsis: One of the goblins stops the player and accusses them of poisoning their beer and thus killing some of the goblins.
PoisoningInterrogation.how_to_trigger: - loadmodule Gustav WLD_Main_A- god- roll amazing- create OBJ_BasicPoison- goto -94.25, 9.78, 442.25- Use the Booze Tub nearby.- Combine Basic Poison with Booze Tub.- You will be spotted. Choose dialogue option: 2 > 1 > 3 > 2- Wait until some of the goblins die to poison.- GOB_GoblinToast_PoisoningInterrogation will trigger after one goblin approach you.

automatic_ordering.reasoning: All three sessions arise from the player poisoning the beer tub. In one branch a goblin witnesses the poisoning and immediately confronts the player (NoticedPoisoning), while in another branch a goblin—standing on a high cage—cheers the act by offering a toast (the session with the empty key). In the toast branch, a later goblin confrontation (PoisoningInterrogation) is triggered as a consequence (its trigger instructions even mention it as GOB_GoblinToast_PoisoningInterrogation, implying that it follows after the toast session has occurred). Because these branches represent alternative outcomes of the poisoning event (either being spotted immediately or celebrated before being formally interrogated), the NoticedPoisoning session is logically mutually exclusive with the toast branch (i.e. both the toast session and its follow‐up, PoisoningInterrogation). The only clear ordering constraint is within the toast branch – the toast (empty key) must come before PoisoningInterrogation.

NoticedPoisoning_10.text: Hey! You tryin' to slip us somethin'?

NoticedPoisoning_42.speaker: Narrator
NoticedPoisoning_42.text: *The mark glows, but you feel nothing in response. Your illithid power is beyond reach until you rest.*

NoticedPoisoning_25.speaker: Narrator
NoticedPoisoning_25.text: *A strange symbol glows, marked on their flesh, and something within you stirs in response.*

NoticedPoisoning_1.speaker: Narrator
NoticedPoisoning_1.text: *As the symbol glows, power courses through you. Authority.*

NoticedPoisoning_27.speaker: Player
NoticedPoisoning_27.text: Don't be stupid. You can barely see straight.

NoticedPoisoning_40.speaker: Player
NoticedPoisoning_40.text: A lethal poison. Enough to take the lot of you down.

NoticedPoisoning_4.context: NodeContext: tnak means 'damn it', pronounced tuh-NACK.

NoticedPoisoning_15.speaker: Player
NoticedPoisoning_15.text: Just a drop of firewine. It'll give the brew a real kick.

NoticedPoisoning_18.text: Eh. Heh. Now that's an idea. Should've thought of that myself!

NoticedPoisoning_26.speaker: Player
NoticedPoisoning_26.text: I'll slip a knife between your ribs if you don't piss off.

NoticedPoisoning_0.speaker: Player
NoticedPoisoning_0.text: You saw nothing, or I'll crush your eyes like grapes. Got it?

NoticedPoisoning_13.text: Tnak. Fine. Hope Gribbo drinks it. At least then she'll shut up 'bout her bloody pigeon!
NoticedPoisoning_13.context: NodeContext: Tnak (pronounced tuh-NACK) means damn it. This is spoken after the player successfully threatened them into keeping their mouth shut about the poisoning.

NoticedPoisoning_6.text: Listen, uh, I got me some business over on the other side of yonder mountain. See you never, yeah?

NoticedPoisoning_22.text: You don't know who you're messin with. I'll kill you and eat you like that dwarf!

NoticedPoisoning_3.speaker: Player
NoticedPoisoning_3.text: Palm the poison vial and feign innocence.

NoticedPoisoning_44.text: Drink must be tellin' on me. Guess I need some more. Heh.

NoticedPoisoning_23.text: Don't think I didn't see that with yer slippery fingers.

NoticedPoisoning_33.text: This one's tryin' to poison us! Kill 'em!

NoticedPoisoning_43.speaker: Player
NoticedPoisoning_43.text: Turn around and walk away. Do not question the will of the Absolute.

NoticedPoisoning_12.speaker: Player
NoticedPoisoning_12.text: Turn around and walk away. Do not question the will of the Absolute.

NoticedPoisoning_16.context: NodeContext: the player just revieled themself to be of much higher standing and told the goblin not to question them.

NoticedPoisoning_2.speaker: Narrator
NoticedPoisoning_2.text: *A shiver runs across your mind... You feel sated.*

NoticedPoisoning_14.speaker: Narrator
NoticedPoisoning_14.text: *Something stirs deep within you, hungry and alert... it's taking something you'll never get back.*

NoticedPoisoning_17.speaker: Narrator
NoticedPoisoning_17.text: *Your mind lurches, reeling suddenly as if... bitten.*

NoticedPoisoning_30.speaker: Narrator
NoticedPoisoning_30.text: *A shadow swims across your vision, and a familiar voice tells you to be calm. You are loved.*

NoticedPoisoning_29.speaker: Narrator
NoticedPoisoning_29.text: *Your blood runs quicker, feeding the gnawing absence at the centre of your mind.*

NoticedPoisoning_19.speaker: Narrator
NoticedPoisoning_19.text: *The presence deep in your mind is awake, unblinking. This is it. A single word pervades your consciousness: 'Soon'.*

NoticedPoisoning_7.speaker: Narrator
NoticedPoisoning_7.text: *Your mind is full, bursting with ecstasy and terror. Finally, it is coming. You are becoming.*

NoticedPoisoning_32.text: Like hells. I don't know what you're gettin' at, but answer the question. What were you doin'?

NoticedPoisoning_38.text: Urk. The world's spinnin'... Heh. The stones look alive, all wriggly. Damn, this is some good beer.
NoticedPoisoning_38.context: NodeContext: We are reading the goblin's mind, so these are their thoughts.

NoticedPoisoning_28.text: What-cha... this'n's some booyahg! They're tryna magick me!
NoticedPoisoning_28.context: NodeContext: BOO-yawg. (w is silent, as in yawn) Booyahg means magic user

40.speaker: Sharp-Eye Mirg
40.context: NodeContext: You just made a really stupid toast, so the goblin is booing you.

95.speaker: Sharp-Eye Mirg
95.text: Watcha standing 'ere all dry fer? C'mere, have a drink!
95.context: CinematicNodeContext: The goblin waves the player over and holds out a drink. (she should be holding two cups, one in each hand). The player isn't on the cage yet.

98.speaker: Sharp-Eye Mirg
98.text: What should we toast to, eh?
98.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player isn't on the cage yet,

49.speaker: Player
49.text: It's your party - celebrate it however you like.

107.speaker: Sharp-Eye Mirg
107.text: Ha! I'll show ya how it's done.
107.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player teleported next to the goblin.NodeContext: Good-natured joke.

43.speaker: Sharp-Eye Mirg
43.context: CinematicNodeContext: She should turn to the left to address the other goblins.  If possible, he should raise his glass at the end. NodeContext: He's calling to the other goblins standing around, then shouting a toast.

7.speaker: Warlock Gurk
7.text: To tha' duke's face when we gave 'im to the drow!
7.context: CinematicNodeContext: All the goblins should raise their cups.InternalNodeContext: There should be a cheer of multiple (3) goblins at the end of this node.NodeContext: The goblin is making a toast.

24.speaker: Sharp-Eye Aggy
24.text: To findin' those looters and crushin' 'em!
24.context: CinematicNodeContext: All the goblins should raise their cups.InternalNodeContext: There should be a cheer of multiple (3) goblins at the end of this node.NodeContext: The goblin is making a toast.

22.speaker: Narrator
22.text: *The goblins blink at you in confusion.*

88.speaker: Player
88.text: May I bed each and every one of you before the sun sets!

54.speaker: Sharp-Eye Mirg
54.context: CinematicNodeContext: The goblins gawk at you while the silence stretches on.NodeContext: The goblin doesn't know how to react. There is a long pause, and then he clears his throat.

81.speaker: Tracker Klagga
81.text: Ya can always take a bite out of me!
81.context: CinematicNodeContext: If there are other goblins in the vicinity, they could look at him as though he's a bit crazy.NodeContext: Very excited. He's totally down for this.

82.speaker: Player
82.text: Spill the beer, then pretend to drink from the empty cup.

1.speaker: Sharp-Eye Mirg
1.context: NodeContext: The player finally drank, she's happy and encouragin them to drink more.

29.speaker: Sharp-Eye Mirg
29.text: Hey! That's our beer you're wastin'! Ain't good enough for ya?
29.context: NodeContext: a little surprised and a little angry.

44.speaker: Sharp-Eye Aggy
44.text: You think there's somethin' wrong with it?
44.context: CinematicNodeContext: The goblin is looking into their cup.NodeContext: aside to another goblin. a little distrustful

38.speaker: Warlock Gurk
38.text: I told ya we shouldn't be drinkin' the foam. It ain't right.

26.speaker: Sharp-Eye Mirg
26.text: Wait, 'ave ya been tamperin' with our beer? That what ye've been standin' 'round 'ere for?

79.speaker: Player
79.text: Don't be stupid. You might be able to drink all day - the Absolute needs me sober.

32.speaker: Sharp-Eye Mirg
32.text: Hah! You drew the short end of the stick, didn't ya? I'd say it's clear who the Absolute favours.

47.speaker: Player
47.text: Drink quickly to squash their suspicions.

36.speaker: Narrator
36.text: *The poison burns your throat, but the goblin relaxes.*

80.speaker: Sharp-Eye Mirg
80.text: You looked real suspicious for a bit. Now get outta my way - I need another drink!
80.context: NodeContext: Hah is an actual laugh.

74.speaker: Player
74.text: Aw, c'mon. I've already had a few cups... can barely see straight.

70.speaker: Sharp-Eye Mirg
70.text: Well, watch it - we worked hard for that beer!
70.context: NodeContext: a little bit displeased, but not actually angry, The player spilled some beer, but she's letting him off.

39.speaker: Sharp-Eye Mirg
39.text: Right, you think I believe that? Lemme show ya how we handle liars 'round here.

87.speaker: Player
87.text: I was checking none of you idiots had spilled anything foul in there.

85.speaker: Sharp-Eye Mirg
85.text: Anyway. 'S good beer, so don't waste it. Now get outta my way - I need another drink!

17.speaker: Sharp-Eye Mirg
17.text: Yer... what... yer lyin', ain'tcha? Lemme show ya how we handle liars 'round here.
17.context: NodeContext: confused at first, then getting angry

18.speaker: Sharp-Eye Mirg
18.text: Wastin' beer just like that drow True Soul. Said she needed a clear head for Absolute business. Bah!
18.context: NodeContext: we are reading her mind. She's a bit confused by what the player just did and doesn't entirely believe someone could've snuck in their camp to poison their beer, because the Absolute would protect them.

28.speaker: Sharp-Eye Mirg
28.text: Hey! Whatcha doin'? I knew there was something off 'bout you! Get 'em!
28.context: NodeContext: Mad and a bit confused. We tried to read her mind, but she realised and is now angry

55.speaker: Player
55.text: After you! I shouldn't drink before the host.

94.speaker: Sharp-Eye Mirg
94.text: Why not? Wait, 'ave ya been tamperin' wif our beer? That what ye've been standin' 'round 'ere for?

14.speaker: Narrator
14.text: *Besides a slight tingle, your stomach doesn't react to the poison.*

67.speaker: Narrator
67.text: *The poison burns your throat, but the goblins follow your lead.*

108.speaker: Player
108.text: I'm simply being a good guest, that's all.

23.speaker: Sharp-Eye Mirg
23.text: That's how you end up dry, mate - not that I'm complainin'!

100.speaker: Sharp-Eye Mirg
100.text: Now get outta my way - I need another drink!

59.speaker: Player
59.text: Show off an elaborate bartending trick.

69.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player balances the cup on their head, dances around for a second with it, then bounces it from their head, catching it in their hand. NodeContext: Do not record.

2.speaker: Sharp-Eye Mirg
2.context: NodeContext: Applauding - the player just did a cool trick.

57.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player fails at its trick of flipping his drink into the air and spilling the drink everywhere (over the player if allowed/able)NodeContext: Do not record.

58.speaker: Sharp-Eye Mirg
58.text: Hey! That's our beer you're wastin'! Shove off!
58.context: NodeContext: Displeased - the player tried to do a trick, but spilled all the beer in his cup.

48.speaker: Player
48.text: I'm glad you asked. Tell everyone to gather round...

68.speaker: Sharp-Eye Mirg
68.text: Guys! This 'un's givin' us a toast!
68.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player teleported next to the goblin. She should turn to the left to address the other goblins. The other goblins go and refill their beer.NodeContext: The goblin is calling over the other goblins standing around.

62.speaker: Player
62.text: I'll pass. Need a clear head for now.

PoisoningInterrogation_8.speaker: Narrator
PoisoningInterrogation_8.text: You! I knew you'd been mucking with our beer! You poisoned us!
PoisoningInterrogation_8.context: NodeContext: Spotting the player and accusing them of being the one who poisoned their beer (and comrades)

PoisoningInterrogation_31.speaker: Narrator
PoisoningInterrogation_31.context: NodeContext: Spotting the player and accusing them of being the one who poisoned their beer (and comrades)

PoisoningInterrogation_40.context: NodeContext: Spotting the player and accusing them of being the one who poisoned their beer (and comrades)

PoisoningInterrogation_26.speaker: Narrator
PoisoningInterrogation_26.text: *The mark glows, but you feel nothing in response. Your illithid power is beyond reach until you rest.*

PoisoningInterrogation_13.speaker: Narrator
PoisoningInterrogation_13.text: *A strange symbol glows, marked on their flesh, and something within you stirs in response.*

PoisoningInterrogation_7.speaker: Player
PoisoningInterrogation_7.text: You poisoned yourselves. This is Elderberry Beer - goblins are allergic to it.

PoisoningInterrogation_36.text: A-allergic? You mean just the beer can kill us?! G-get out of my way. I need some fresh air.
PoisoningInterrogation_36.context: NodeContext: surprised and scared. We just said goblins are allergic to the beer they've been drinking the whole time.

PoisoningInterrogation_39.speaker: Player
PoisoningInterrogation_39.text: If I'd poisoned you, do you really think I'd still be here?

PoisoningInterrogation_18.text: Tnak, you're right. Whoever did this could be anywhere by now.
PoisoningInterrogation_18.context: NodeContext: Tnak means damn it, pronounced tuh-NACK. Annoyed and disappointed. they think they'll never find the killer.

PoisoningInterrogation_20.text: Or you just thought we'd be stupid enough to believe ya!
PoisoningInterrogation_20.context: NodeContext: We gave a lousy excuse and they're seeing right through it. They're going to attack us now.

PoisoningInterrogation_12.speaker: Player
PoisoningInterrogation_12.text: I did, but I can slit your throat if you'd prefer a quick death.

PoisoningInterrogation_32.text: P-please don't! I won't rat you out, I swear! J-just leave me be.
PoisoningInterrogation_32.context: NodeContext: We intimidated them and confessed we killed their comrades, but this goblin doesn't want to risk his own hide for revenge.

PoisoningInterrogation_16.text: Th-this one's all right, lads! Knows nothin' about no poisonin'!

PoisoningInterrogation_0.context: NodeContext: We admitted to killing their comrades and threatened to kill them too, but they aren't intimidated and want to kill us.

PoisoningInterrogation_25.speaker: Player
PoisoningInterrogation_25.text: Could've done a lot worse. A lot worse.

PoisoningInterrogation_21.speaker: Player
PoisoningInterrogation_21.text: Consider it a privilege. I could have just gutted you.

PoisoningInterrogation_22.speaker: Player
PoisoningInterrogation_22.text: And why would I do that? I'm a True Soul.

PoisoningInterrogation_4.text: V-very sorry - I didn't know. I swear I didn't know!
PoisoningInterrogation_4.context: NodeContext: They just realised they are talking to someone of higher rank.

PoisoningInterrogation_38.speaker: Narrator
PoisoningInterrogation_38.text: *A shiver runs across your mind... You feel sated.*

PoisoningInterrogation_15.speaker: Narrator
PoisoningInterrogation_15.text: *Something stirs deep within you, hungry and alert... it's taking something you'll never get back.*

PoisoningInterrogation_2.speaker: Narrator
PoisoningInterrogation_2.text: *Your mind lurches, reeling suddenly as if... bitten.*

PoisoningInterrogation_35.speaker: Narrator
PoisoningInterrogation_35.text: *A shadow swims across your vision, and a familiar voice tells you to be calm. You are loved.*

PoisoningInterrogation_6.speaker: Narrator
PoisoningInterrogation_6.text: *Your blood runs quicker, feeding the gnawing absence at the centre of your mind.*

PoisoningInterrogation_24.speaker: Narrator
PoisoningInterrogation_24.text: *The presence deep in your mind is awake, unblinking. This is it. A single word pervades your consciousness: 'Soon'.*

PoisoningInterrogation_42.speaker: Narrator
PoisoningInterrogation_42.text: *Your mind is full, bursting with ecstasy and terror. Finally, it is coming. You are becoming.*

PoisoningInterrogation_14.text: You, a True Soul? I'd be shakin' in my boots if you were, but all I'm feelin' is the urge to see your guts.
PoisoningInterrogation_14.context: NodeContext: We tried to confince them we are of higher rank, but they think the notion is laughable.

PoisoningInterrogation_1.speaker: Player
PoisoningInterrogation_1.text: And why would I do that? I'm a True Soul.

PoisoningInterrogation_3.text: I knew we shouldn'tve taken that fancy berry beer. Could've tasted the poison if it hadn't been so sweet.
PoisoningInterrogation_3.context: NodeContext: We are hearing the goblin's thoughts. The goblin is despairing because it thinks they would have tasted the poison (and thus the others wouldn't have died) if they hadn't stolen the fancy berry beer.

PoisoningInterrogation_34.text: What are you... this one's tryin' to control my mind or somethin'!
PoisoningInterrogation_34.context: NodeContext: The goblin felt the player poking around in their head and is freaked out and angry.

PoisoningInterrogation_17.speaker: Narrator
PoisoningInterrogation_17.text: *As the symbol glows, power courses through you. Authority.*
